bibl.title: Alexander and Alexandria: A View from Kom el-Dikka.
Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011.

bibl.note: Discusses the location of Alexander the Great's tomb in Alexandria.
bibl.seg: Adam Łukaszewicz, Alexander and Alexandria: A View from Kom el-Dikka.

Volker Grieb, Krzysztof Nawotka & Agnieszka Wojciechowska (edd.), Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011 = Philippika. Altertumskundliche Abhandlungen. 74 (Wiesbaden, 2014) pp. 307-314.
Discusses the location of Alexander the Great's tomb in Alexandria.
